|brand = EnGenius |model = EMP-8602 PLUS |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AG108 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Atheros;AR5413; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna2 = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = -96 |transmit_power = 26
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = abg |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :Up to 100mW for 802.11a / 400mW for 802.11b/g See also [[EnGenius EMP-8602 PLUS-S]].. :Up to 150mW for 802.11a / 600mW for 802.11b/g
===GENERAL INFORMATION=== *Frequency Band: :802.11a: 5.15~5.35GHz, 5.47~5.725GHz, 5.725~5.825GHz :802.11b/g: 2.400~2.484GHz *Operating Channels: :802.11a: 21 for North America :802.11b/g: 11 for North America *Regulation Certification: FCC Part 15 *Media Access Protocol: :Carrier Sense Multiple Access with Collision Avoidance (CSMA/CA) *Modulation Technology: OFDM: :DBPSK, DQPSK, CCK, BPSK, QPSK, 16-QAM, 64-QAM, DSSS *Security: 64/128-bit WEP Encryption :802.1x Client Support (EAP-TLS & EAP-TTLS) :WPA/WPA2 Protected Access (TKIP & AES) *Standard: 802.11a / 802.11b / 802.11g / 802.1x / :802.11i / 802.11h / 802.1e /802.1j *Form Factor: Mini-PCI TypeIIIB *Dimensions: 59.60mm x 44.45mm *Antenna Connector: U.FL x2 *Operating Voltage: 3.3V +/- 0.15V *Temperature Range: Operation 0 째C to 55 째C / Storage -20 째C to 70 째C *Humidity (Non-condensing): 5%~95% Typical
===RADIO FREQUENCY BAND=== *Receive Sensitivity (Typical): :*802.11a (5.15~5.82GHz) :6Mbps @ -90dBm :54Mbps @ -74dBm :*802.11g (2.412~2.472GHz) :6Mbps @ -92dBm :54Mbps @ -76dBm :*802.11b (2.412~2.472GHz) :11Mbps @ -92dBm :1Mbps @ -96dBm *Available Transmit Power: :*802.11a (5.15~5.35 & 5.5~5.7GHz) :17 dBm @ 6~24Mbps :16 dBm @ 36Mbps :15 dBm @ 48Mbps :14 dBm @ 54Mbps :*802.11a (5.725~5.825GHz) :20 dBm @ 6,9,12,18,24Mbps :19 dBm @ 36Mbps :18 dBm @ 48Mbps :17 dBm @ 54Mbps :*802.11g (2.412~2.472GHz) :26 dBm @ 6,9,12,18,24Mbps :25 dBm @ 36Mbps :24 dBm @ 48Mbps :23 dBm @ 54Mbps :*802.11b (2.412~2.472GHz) :26 dBm @ 1~11Mbps
===CURRENT CONSUMPTION INFORMATION=== :Continue Tx: <= 750mA :Continue Rx: <= 400mA :LINK Mode: <= 400mA
===DRIVER=== *Windows XP *Linux MadWi </small>
